name.description: Name of the Indian dessert dish.

ingredients.description: Comma-separated list of ingredients used in the dessert.
examples: Carrots, milk, sugar, ghee, cashews, raisins
Flour, ghee, milk, sugar, saffron, almonds

diet.description: Indicates whether the dish is vegetarian or non-vegetarian.

flavor_profile.description: The general flavor taste of the dessert.

course.description: The course during which the dessert is typically served.

state.description: The Indian state where the dessert is popular or originates from.

region.description: The geographical region of India the dessert is associated with.

indian_desserts.table_description: Contains information about traditional Indian desserts, their ingredients, preparation and cooking times, flavor profiles, and the regions they are associated with.
